author: unico
msg: JCR-3506 add ability of reverse lucene index check: whether all items in the repository that should be indexed are present in the index. because this check will take more time and resources it must be explicitly enabled using a system property.

msg: More robust handling of user status

msg: CAMEL-4629: Languages can now load script from external resource, such as file or classpath.
